_header: Love made Christ in our lady to light
Subjects: Christ, love of; love, of Christ
_description: On the Love of Christ — four rhyming lines (aa) appearing twice in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Reuthe made god on mayden to lithteReuthe mad him comen to mannes
                    sihteRetuhe mad his armis on rode sprede& reuthe mad him wepen
                    & loude grede
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 35.
